verbs.description: " [ARG1: The USPS] [V: is] [ARG2: on an unsustainable financial path] and must be restructured to prevent a taxpayer - funded bailout , " said the order , signed by Trump . The Postal Service , which is supposed to be self - sustaining , must ask Congress for permission to raise rates and must pre - fund decades worth of retiree health benefits . Details of Amazon 's payments to USPS are not ...
